trace_targets.description: Traces A* paths between a list of target coordinates, avoiding obstacles and saving all reachable points to a file.

inputs.name: input_target_list
inputs.description: Required. List of (x,y) tuple target coordinates. can be multiple coordinates NOT FILE

inputs.name: output_target_path
inputs.description: Optional File path to write improved point list (CSV).

inputs.name: start
inputs.description: Optional start (x,y); defaults to robot_pos in data.

inputs.name: data_folder
inputs.description: Optional Folder containing arena and obstacle data.

inputs.name: spacing
inputs.description: Optional Dilation padding for obstacle mask.

output.type: Tuple[np.ndarray, List[Tuple[int, int]], List[Tuple[int, int, int, int]], Tuple[int, int], List[Tuple[int, int]], List[List[Tuple[int, int]]]]
output.description: Returns (frame image, arena corners, obstacles list, start position, target list, paths list).
